page.title: 05PRIMARY SCHOOL, KINGBARNS
page.content: { { { { {PRIMARY SCHOOL, KINGSBARNS} THERE IS ONE PRIMARY SCHOOL WITH A ROLL OF 21. {EMPLOYMENT, KINGSBARNS} {AREA EMPLOYMENT ST. ANDREWS, SEVEN MILES AWAY, IN SHOPS, IN HOTELS AND IN THE UNIVERSITY OF ST. ANDREWS; AT THE R.A.F. LEUCHARS. THERE ARE ALSO TEACHERS, ONE POLICEMAN, TWO DOCTORS AND PIGGERY WORKERS. {LOCAL EMPLOYMENT} THE LOCAL WORK IS ON FARMS. {ENTERTAINMENT, KINGSBARNS} THE MEMORIAL HALL IS USED FOR DANCES, WEDDINGS, PARTIES AND SHOWS - DRAMA AND LIGHT ENTERTAINMENT.
